20.eng-name: The Book of Qiyam Al-Lail (The Night Prayer) and Voluntary Prayers During the Day

hadiths.text: Muhammad bin Al-Muthanna informed us, he said:"Yahya bin Sa'eed narrated to us from Shu'bah, from Qatadah, from Zurarah, from Imran bin Husain, who said The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) prayed Zuhr, and a man recited 'Glorify the Name of your Lord, the Most High.' When he finished praying, he said: 'Who recited: 'Glorify the Name of Your Lord, the Most High?' A man said: 'I did.' He said: 'I knew that someone was competing with me in it

chapter.ara-name: باب ذِكْرِ الاِخْتِلاَفِ عَلَى شُعْبَةَ عَنْ قَتَادَةَ، فِي هَذَا الْحَدِيثِ . ج }
